abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid33332778, pmid33301436, pmid33327028, pmid32917809, pmid33269805, pmid33263249, pmid33333581, pmid33306235, pmid33287877, pmid33326503
